Class PhotoEditorActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      cmput301W12.android.project.view.PhotoEditorActivity

public class PhotoEditorActivity
extends Activity

This class currently allows you to tag a new photo with Skin conditions and Groups. I would like to implement an add group, and add condition button. I would also like to make the image in the activity display the recently taken photo.
